Title: Gas Food Lodging
Actors: Brooke Adams, Ione Skye, Fairuza Balk, James Brolin
Plot: In the boring desert of New Mexico, a single mother raises her two teenage daughters, Shade and Trudi, whose deepest desire is to leave the dead calm town. Shade is the type to escape in her extravagant fantasies while Trudi is so rebelious it could drive her away.
